title: #350: Reptilians, Big Foot, Black Nobility IDF Reading w/ Phoenix Aurelius & Lindsey Scharmyn
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I did a livestream IDF reading swapcast with the Rogue Ways Podcact's Lindsey Scharmyn and Alchemist Phoenix Aurelius. This was awesome and I can't wait to do it again! Thank you so much for your support.

Sam Tripoli Live Shows:
Hollywood Saturday 8th: Tin Foil Hat Live at The Comedy Store

Appleton Wisconsin Sept 10th-12th: Headlining the Skyline Comedy Club
https://www.skylinecomedy.com/events/40525

please check out Lindsey Scharmyn's Internet:
Twitter: twitter.com/ApotropaicSoul

website: http://quorrischarmyn.com

podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/rogue-ways/id1428197805
